metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32149 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An attacker may cause a denial of service by crafting an Accept-Language header which ParseAcceptLanguage will take significant time to parse.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-text-dev - 0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1').
golang-x-text: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'transitional package').
